messages.subject: NHK 2003 TV series MUSASHI
messages.msgSnippet: Recently I was given a copy of the 2003 TV series Musashi with English subtitles. I had already purchased this series some time ago. If anyone is interested in
messages.messageBody:
Recently I was given a copy of the 2003 TV series Musashi with English
subtitles. I had already purchased this series some time ago. If anyone
is interested in buying a copy from me or purhaps trading for another
series please contact me. I thought I would give the group members a
shot before I put this on Ebay.

Hirai
